body.bibl: Brelaud, Simon. “Syriac / Chaldean Literature and Writing Tradition.” In Diyarbakir’s Documentary Cultural Heritage: Manuscripts of Syriac Orthodox Church of the Virgin Mary and Mar Petyun Chaldean Church, edited by Birgül Açıkyıldız and Nevin Soyukaya, 95–118.
